name: parallel
signature: <E, E2>(left: Cause<E>, right: Cause<E2>) => Cause<E | E2>
description:
Combines two `Cause`s in parallel.
*Details This function merges two errors that occurred simultaneously. Instead of
discarding one error, both are retained, allowing for richer error reporting
and debugging.
documentation:
